Title: BSHI Guideline: HLA matching and donor selection for haematopoietic progenitor cell transplantation
Abstract: © 2016 John Wiley & Sons LtdA review of the British Society for Histocompatibility and Immunogenetics (BSHI) “Guideline for selection and HLA matching of related, adult unrelated donors and umbilical cord units for haematopoietic progenitor cell transplantation” was undertaken by a BSHI appointed writing committee. Literature searches were performed, and the data extracted were presented as recommendations according to the GRADE nomenclature.
